  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.IntegerObjectMaxHeap<V>

    V - Value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntegerObjectHeap<V>

extends Object
implements IntegerObjectHeap<V>
    Binary heap for primitive types.

    Erich Schubert
